Megaupload Toolbar is known to redirect users to a custom error page when a [[HTTP 404|404]] error occurs in the user's browser as well as contain a spyware named Alexa.
+
Megaupload Toolbar is known to redirect users to a custom error page when a [[HTTP 404|404]] error occurs in the user's browser as well as contains spyware.
<ref>[http://www.thecredence.com/megaupload-toolbar-is-a-spyware-which-changes-browser-settings/ Megaupload Toolbar is a Spyware which Changes Browser Settings], TheCredence.com, 13/08/08</ref> The custom pages, however, can be disabled.
<ref>[http://www.thecredence.com/megaupload-toolbar-is-a-spyware-which-changes-browser-settings/ Megaupload Toolbar is a Spyware which Changes Browser Settings], TheCredence.com, 13/08/08</ref> The custom pages, however, can be disabled.
